**Status**: Lab Technician at the University of Michigan, Weber Lab <br> **Field**: Ecology & Evolutionary Biology <br> **Interests**: Evolutionary ecology, global change, population genetics, machine learning <br> **Techs**: Python, R, C++, Rust, SLiM

## Summary

First-gen academic with years of experience in the lab, field, and behind a screen. Interested in patterns of ecological organization across spatiotemporal scales, the evolutionary drivers of those patterns, and how those patterns respond to global change. Fascinated with emerging methods for evaluating complex systems, including community science, machine learning, and tree sequence statistics.
